about_the_game:
Vs dev is an evolving game where the goal is to beat the developer.
It's a constantly evolving experience that puts your skills to the test against a formidable opponent: the developer himself.


Explore locations, search for objects crucial to your progress and solve mini-games along the way. Every nook and cranny may hold the key to your survival.


As you progress, feel the evolution of the gameplay that propels you from a horrific survival to a frantic action experience. The weapons you collect become your allies in this fight for survival, ruthlessly eliminating any enemies in your path. Mini-games and puzzles add a layer of complexity, testing not only your skill, but also your intellect.

The evolution of the game accompanies your own progress, creating a unique gaming experience.
Take on the developer in this dynamic mix of genres, from survival horror to action shooter, eventually reaching an intense arcade level. The real question is: do you have what it takes to beat the game's master and emerge victorious from this uncompromising experience ?

name: Versus Dev Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows®10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Rtx 2060S (8gb vram)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD

short_description: Explore, evolve and take on the developer.
